title: South Dakota DOC Youth Pay to Stay Policy

communications.subject: South Dakota Open Records Law Request: South Dakota DOC Youth Pay to Stay Policy
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Dakota Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

The following materials regarding the imposition, assessment, collection and balances of fees and debt for incarcerated youth (i.e., juvenile):

a) All current policies and procedures regarding medical and room & board costs or fees for which incarcerated youth (i.e. juvenile) and/or their parents or legal guardians are or may become liable. Please include all policies and procedures related to how fees are set, accrued, imposed, collected, and enforced (such as those related to per diem fees, ability to pay determinations, penalties for late or non-payment, authorization for civil or criminal action for payment enforcement, etc). 

b) All reports, databases, spreadsheets, or equivalent materials regarding debts/restitution paid to or owed to this department/office or any facility/agency under its jurisdiction in FY2021. Please include all relevant data regarding medical and room & board costs, including the number of youths (i.e., juveniles) charged for medical and room & board costs or fees and the total amount of medical and room & board fees imposed in FY2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mercy Loyo

title: Facebook Law Enforcement Online Request portal accessees in public health (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. The list of all employees and their rank/job title within your agency who have been granted access to the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login).
2. Your agency's internal procedures, if any, in determining who would exercise access to the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login) on your agency's behalf.
3. Your agency's procedures, guidelines and policies in determining when the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login) would be used, and who would be permitted to authorise its use.
4. Documented actions by your agency in the use of the Facebook Content Request System (https://www.facebook.com/xtakedowns/login).
5. All e-mails received by any employee of your agency that contain the keyword "content request" (not case sensitive) and originate from the facebook.com domain.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Chris von Csefalvay

You have just created a user account with City of New York. If it was created in error, deactivate your account. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/deactivate.htm?guid=f5e9ab6498f645c3a4d5fe98e6c4d346&token=yDHfYBMSSkinzeejZeMoHGhaCvFlfbgLwlEKdAslTLUQyGIvdWOTNlWAzMQDdtdO&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv) to confirm your email address. (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=f5e9ab6498f645c3a4d5fe98e6c4d346&token=yDHfYBMSSkinzeejZeMoHGhaCvFlfbgLwlEKdAslTLUQyGIvdWOTNlWAzMQDdtdO&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) Click this link 
If the above link does not work, paste the following address into your browser: https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=f5e9ab6498f645c3a4d5fe98e6c4d346&token=yDHfYBMSSkinzeejZeMoHGhaCvFlfbgLwlEKdAslTLUQyGIvdWOTNlWAzMQDdtdO&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD (https://www1.nyc.gov/account/validateToken.htm?guid=f5e9ab6498f645c3a4d5fe98e6c4d346&token=yDHfYBMSSkinzeejZeMoHGhaCvFlfbgLwlEKdAslTLUQyGIvdWOTNlWAzMQDdtdO&target=aHR0cHM6Ly9hODYwLW9wZW5yZWNvcmRzLm55Yy5nb3Yv&spName=OpenRecordsPRD) 
We ask you to confirm your email to ensure our emails will be delivered. This is the address you will log in with, and the address to which we will deliver all email messages regarding invitations and requests, and other system mail. 
You can change your email address at any time, but will only be able to log in with it once you have confirmed the email address by clicking the link. 
Thank you for using NYC.gov.

communications.subject: [OpenRecords] Request FOIL-2022-067-00201 Submitted to Administration for Children's Services (ACS)
communications.communication:
Your request FOIL-2022-067-00201 has been successfully submitted to the Administration for Children's Services (ACS).
                                The details of your request are shown below. 
 
Request Title: New York Youth Pay to Stay Policy 
 
Request Description: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

The following materials regarding the imposition, assessment, collection and balances of fees and debt for incarcerated youth (i.e., juvenile):

a) All current policies and procedures regarding medical and room & board costs or fees for which incarcerated youth (i.e. juvenile) and/or their parents or legal guardians are or may become liable. Please include all policies and procedures related to how fees are set, accrued, imposed, collected, and enforced (such as those related to per diem fees, ability to pay determinations, penalties for late or non-payment, authorization for civil or criminal action for payment enforcement, etc).

b) All reports, databases, spreadsheets, or equivalent materials regarding debts/restitution paid to or owed to this department/office or any facility/agency under its jurisdiction in FY2021. Please include all relevant data regarding medical and room & board costs, including the number of youths (i.e., juveniles) charged for medical and room & board costs or fees and the total amount of medical and room & board fees imposed in FY2021.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Wayne Byun

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fadministration-childrens-services-4372%252Fnew-york-youth-pay-to-stay-policy-138068%252F%253Femail%253Dnoreply%252540nyc.gov&url_auth_token=AABpaQfoGwKHbPJRJihpNV-JwKs%3A1p7TZ9%3AXuMwpQKXH8ekTaxfi7Zz3y9UswgUZHiQhGCv9LZOwmY

communications.subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] Montana Freedom of Information Act Request: Montana BCC Youth Pay to Stay Policy
communications.communication:
Good morning,

The Montana Board of Crime Control (MBCC) is not the entity that would have the records requested.  MBCC does not manage any juvenile facilities or impose fines.  I would suggest checking with the Office of Court Administrator and the Department of Corrections.

Thank you,


[Montana Board of Crime Control logo]
Natalia Bowser
Director
Montana Board of Crime Control | nbowser@mt.gov<mailto:nbowser@mt.gov>
Office: 406-444-4244 | Cell: 406-461-4114
5 S. Last Chance Gulch | PO Box 201408 | Helena, MT 59620

Your request has been assigned the following tracking number: H017807-121922. Your request has a legally received date of December 20, 2022. You will receive a response by the Department by December 29, 2022. Unfortunately, we are unable to expedite requests and the time permitted for response by the Department may be extended beyond December 29, 2022 by ten (10) business days. 
In accordance with the Michigan Freedom of Information Act (FOIA), MCL 15.231 et seq, the Department provides copies of existing non-exempt records. Records which are exempt from disclosure under state or federal law will not be provided, or records may be redacted to separate exempt information. The FOIA does not require the Department to create new records or answer queries. 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the MDHHS Public Records Center and you will receive an email when your request has been completed.
